backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling authorization, user profiles, and storing video/note bookmarks per user with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three UI-related features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and behavior across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background and text settings.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all routes and pages, with splash-screen handling and an AppErrorBoundary wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and displays a reloadable fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/AppLogo.tsx: Logo component showing a generated globe image with fallback to the Thah Study logo on load failure.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication control button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with error recovery.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with Nepali labels and active-state highlighting for core app sections.
frontend/src/components/CourseImageCarou: Image carousel with auto‑advance, manual navigation buttons, and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/DriveViewer.tsx: Displays Google Drive files with embed preview, download handling, and offline save support.
frontend/src/components/SoundPlayer.tsx: Simple audio player that auto‑plays a fixed sound when triggered.
frontend/src/components/TopicVideoList.t: Scrollable list of topic‑grouped videos with selection highlighting and bookmark toggling.
frontend/src/components/YouTubePlayer.ts: Generates YouTube embed URLs from various link formats and renders a responsive iframe player.
frontend/src/content/exams.ts: Defines exam sets with IDs, titles, durations, and Drive URLs, including some marked coming soon.
frontend/src/content/gk.ts: General Knowledge subject config with notes and multiple topics containing YouTube video lists.
frontend/src/content/iq.ts: IQ subject config organizing several test categories, each with multiple YouTube video links.
frontend/src/content/oldQuestions.ts: Lists old exam questions for three papers, each year containing optional Drive URLs or coming‑soon flags.
frontend/src/content/secondPaper.ts: Defines subject configs for office management and constitution, listing topics with associated video URLs and notes.
frontend/src/content/syllabus.ts: Exports an array of syllabus links for various provinces and parts, some with drive URLs and one marked coming soon.
frontend/src/content/thirdPaper.ts: Provides service management subject configuration with topics and multiple related video resources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages local and cloud-synced video and note bookmarks, merging backend and local data after authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer hook with start, stop, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, stores, and updates user notifications with local persistence and unread tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineLibrary.ts: Manages a locally stored offline library of documents, videos, and notes with add/remove functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, global styles, utility classes, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard UI with subject categories, header, notifications badge, and course carousel.
frontend/src/pages/Exam.tsx: Implements exam selection and timed exam flow with countdown, DriveViewer display, and completion handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotesBookmarks.tsx: Shows user’s bookmarked notes with delete support and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Displays categorized notifications and allows marking items as read.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineLibrary.tsx: Lists downloaded offline items with open and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/OldQuestions.tsx: Displays old exam question sets in tabbed lists and opens selected items in a Drive viewer.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen with logo and titles while temporarily disabling page scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectContent.tsx: Renders subject-specific videos, search, bookmarking, and notes with a responsive layout and resizable panels.
frontend/src/pages/Syllabus.tsx: Lists syllabus items and opens selected entries in a Drive viewer, with support for coming-soon items.
frontend/src/pages/VideoBookmarks.tsx: Displays and filters bookmarked videos, allowing removal and navigation back to the main page.
frontend/src/types/content.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for videos, topics, and subject configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/src/utils/videoSearch.ts: Implements keyword-based filtering of topics and videos, returning only relevant matches.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom OKLCH color system, animations, container settings, and loading typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of app requirements, architecture notes, issues, and existing features for a Nepali exam‑prep mobile app with videos, notes, mock exams, and themed UI.
